summary: This module provides a comprehensive set of unit tests for Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR) operations using the boto3 client. Leveraging the Moto library to mock AWS services, the tests verify repository creation and deletion, image management (put, batch delete, list, describe), lifecycle and registry policies, tag handling, replication configurations, authorization token retrieval, and image scanning, including both successful workflows and expected error conditions.
business_intent: Ensure that the ECR client functionality works correctly across a wide range of scenarios, guaranteeing reliable repository and image management, policy enforcement, and error handling in applications that interact with AWS ECR.
